desc.en: The metro network embarked in 1900, the year of the Olympics by a designed Fulgence Bienvenüe. It has been being a companion with Parisians for 124 years within 14 metro lines, 5 RER lines and diverse Transilen lines connecting Paris and surrounding towns, is reliable for 1.4 billion voyagers per year.
desc.fr: RATP est a métro, RER, transilen système traver la région de Île de la France. L'establishment de Parisien métro est 1900, la quatrième ville qui dispose de services de métro. C'est parti notre voyage en Paris.

updateHistory.reason: New template of the transportation map of Paris not including the tramway
